article:
Young people and   _  people do not always agree.
They sometimes have  _  ideas about living,  _  and
playing. But in one special program in New York State, adults and teenagers
live together in  _  .
    Each summer 200 teenagers and 50   _  live together for eight
weeks as  _  of a special work group. Everyone works several
hours each day. The aim is not just to keep busy. It is to find meaning and  _  in work. Some teenagers work in the woods or on the  _  near
the village. Some learn to make furniture and to build houses. The adults  _  them these  _  .
    There are several   _  hours each day. Weekends are free, too.
During the free hours some of the teenagers learn photography or painting  others  sit around and talk or sing. Each teenager chooses his own way to  _  his free time.
    When people live together,   _  are always necessary. In this
program the teenagers and the adults make the rules together.  _  someone  _  a rule, the problem goes before the whole group. The
group discusses the  _  . They ask,"Why did it happen?"  _   should we do about it?
    One of the teenagers has this to say about the   _  :"You stop thinking only about   _  . You learn how to think about the group."
